snippet: Denmark's prime minister pressed Bahrain to release a jailed activist on Tuesday, as the kingdom continued to dismiss claims that its crackdown on dissent made it unfit to host an international motor race.
abstract: Denmark's prime minister pressed Bahrain to release a jailed activist on Tuesday, as the kingdom continued to dismiss claims that its crackdown on dissent made it unfit to host an international motor race.

headline.main: Denmark Presses Bahrain to Release Activist Amid Doubts Over Formula One Race
